Room.Name: Allakaren Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the eastern ridge of the Allakaren Circle in Oceancrest.
Room.LongDescription: The mysterious Tree of Life lives in the center of Allakaren Circle, and has existed at this point for as long as anyone can remember. It was thought that the Pharaoh Allakaren once planted the tree and fed it the blood of his wives when they died. Whether or not this is true remains to be seen as no blood has been spilled on the tree for centuries.
